title: Bluffing support: hold priority to represent tricks
description:
Currently pass_priority always auto-passes when there are no playable cards. This is efficient but prevents bluffing â€” holding priority briefly to represent having instant-speed interaction.

Possible approaches:
1. A bluff parameter on pass_priority that delays the pass by a random 1-3s
2. A separate bluff_priority tool that holds priority for a specified duration
3. LLM-side delay before calling pass_priority (simplest but wastes a round trip)

This is lower priority than yield_until since bluffing has marginal strategic value in most games, but it's a nice-to-have for realism.
